item.title: 贝莱德私募债务基金股息大幅削减后股价暴跌
item.description: 贝莱德旗下私募债务基金在早盘交易中股价下跌，此前该基金削减了股息。利率下降和不良贷款损失对业绩构成压力。【原文：A BlackRock Inc. private debt fund sank in early trading after cutting its dividend, as declining rates and losses on soured loans pressured results.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒正洽谈剥离社交平台Truth Social
item.description: 特朗普传媒与科技集团去年宣布与一家拥有近三十年历史的核聚变公司达成60亿美元合并协议，该公司表示正就将其旗下社交平台Truth Social分拆为独立公司进行谈判。【原文：Trump Media & Technology Group Corp., which last year announced a $6 billion merger with a nearly three-decade-old nuclear fusion company, said it is in talks to spin off its Truth Social unit into a separate company.】

item.title: 《商业周刊》如何分析Stake平台明星网红的老虎机游戏玩法
item.description:
调查发现，由加密货币赌场支付的顶级主播比其他主播更频繁地赢得大额奖金。【原文：

The investigation found that top streamers paid by the crypto casino won big more often than others.

】

item.title: 巴克莱考虑采用区块链平台处理支付与存款业务
item.description: 巴克莱银行正就创建区块链平台事宜与技术供应商进行接洽，该平台将用于处理支付等业务流程。此举使其与摩根大通等全球竞争对手一道，共同探索将数字资产技术应用于各类银行业务的可能性。【原文：Barclays Plc is sounding out technology providers on creating a blockchain platform for handling processes like payments, joining global rivals like JPMorgan Chase & Co. in exploring the use of digital-asset technology for various banking services.】

item.title: OpenAI以7300亿美元估值完成110亿美元融资
item.description: OpenAI在最新融资中筹集了110亿美元，公司估值达到7300亿美元。这是ChatGPT开发者迄今为止规模最大的融资轮，将助力其推进耗资巨大的计划——为人工智能开发获取更多计算资源和人才。【原文：OpenAI has raised $110 billion in a deal that values the startup at $730 billion, representing the ChatGPT maker’s largest funding round to date and bolstering its costly push to secure more computing power and talent for AI development.】

item.title: 美国生产者价格因服务业上涨幅度超预期
item.description: 1月份美国生产者价格涨幅超出预期，主要由服务业推动，表明通胀压力持续存在。【原文：Prices paid to US producers rose in January by more than forecast, fueled by services and pointing to lingering inflationary pressures.】

item.title: 加拿大第四季度国内生产总值萎缩0.6%，库存下降
item.description: 加拿大经济以疲软态势结束本年度，因企业库存急剧下降，第四季度实际国内生产总值按年率计算下滑0.6%。【原文：The Canadian economy ended the year on a softer note as a sharp decline in business inventories drove down real gross domestic product by an annualized 0.6% in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 埃尼集团将削减安哥拉资产，因巴西和美国产量增长
item.description: 据知情人士透露，挪威最大石油天然气生产商埃奎诺尔公司正计划出售其在安哥拉的若干油田。【原文：Equinor ASA, Norway’s biggest oil and gas producer, is looking to sell a number of Angolan fields, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿根廷400亿美元铜矿热潮取决于修订后的冰川法
item.description:
哈维尔·米莱推动释放数十亿美元采矿投资的举措，需要放宽环保组织正在捍卫的严格保护措施。【原文：

Javier Milei’s push to unlock billions in mining investment requires easing strict protections that are being defended by environmental groups.

】

item.title: 德国通胀率回落至2%，经济复苏缓慢启动
item.description: 德国通胀率意外降至欧洲央行的目标水平，因2026年初经济复苏步伐缓慢。【原文：German inflation unexpectedly slowed to the European Central Bank’s target as the economy recovered only slowly at the start of 2026.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：CoreWeave、戴尔、Flutter、Kore、NCR Atleos
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7:39，标普500指数期货下跌0.5%，预计将录得月度跌幅。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures are down 0.5% as of 7:39 a.m. in New York, set to notch a monthly loss.】

item.title: 欧佩克+似乎准备再次无视看跌油价者的警告
item.description: 该集团因不受其控制的因素而获得了回旋余地。【原文：The group has gained room to maneuver thanks to factors beyond its control.】

item.title: 沙特储备因石油和债务销售攀升至2022年以来最高水平
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯上月国际储备升至2022年以来最高水平，得益于石油收入增加和外债发行规模扩大。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s international reserves rose to the highest level since 2022 last month, boosted by increased oil revenues and elevated foreign-debt issuance.】

item.title: 日本高市早苗借鉴特朗普的央行策略
item.description: 新任总理承诺将持续推动经济增长。【原文：The new premier has pledged to repeatedly “hit the button” on economic growth.】

item.title: 英伟达黄仁勋面对投资者群体，被要求推出下一个重大创新
item.description: 这家芯片制造商的爆炸式增长如今已显得司空见惯。【原文：The chipmaker’s explosive growth already seems like old hat】

item.title: 信贷担忧令蓝猫基金面临2022年以来最糟糕的月份
item.description: 蓝猫资本公司股价正朝着近四年最大月度跌幅迈进，投资者对规模达1.8万亿美元的私募信贷行业动荡加剧的担忧持续升温。【原文：Shares of Blue Owl Capital Inc. are on track for their biggest monthly decline in nearly four years, as investor anxiety grows over turbulence in the $1.8 trillion private credit industry.】

item.title: Rightmove股价反弹为人工智能抛售潮中的富时100指数成分股带来生存希望
item.description: Rightmove Plc周五公布强劲财报后股价大涨，这为这家深陷困境的房产门户网站提供了避免从富时100指数中退出的机会。【原文：Rightmove Plc’s rally after solid earnings on Friday has given the embattled property portal a chance of avoiding relegation from the FTSE 100 index.】

item.title: 黑石与布鲁克菲尔德加入80亿欧元大众汽车业务单元竞购行列
item.description: 知情人士透露，黑石集团和布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司等私募股权公司已提交至少80亿欧元（约合94亿美元）的新报价，加入大众汽车集团重型柴油发动机业务多数股权的下一轮竞购。【原文：Blackstone Inc. and Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. are among the private equity firms in the next round of bidding for a majority stake in Volkswagen AG’s heavy diesel engine unit, having made new offers of at least €8 billion ($9.4 billion), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 沙特投资者加大美股交易力度，因本土市场下跌
item.description: 2025年，沙特阿拉伯投资者大幅增加了对美国股票的交易，将资本从国内市场转移出去——该市场当时位列全球表现最差的市场之列。【原文：Saudi Arabian investors sharply increased their trading in US equities in 2025, redirecting capital away from a domestic market that ranked among the world’s worst performers.】

item.title: 软件初创公司Dash0正就融资事宜进行磋商，估值约为10亿美元。
item.description: 知情人士透露，软件初创公司Dash0正就融资事宜展开磋商，其估值约为10亿美元。该公司致力于协助企业监控系统异常情况。【原文：Dash0, a software startup that helps companies monitor their systems for anomalies, is in discussions to raise funds at a valuation of about $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 动荡世界中，美国国债仍是最佳选择
item.description:
美国政府债务创下一年来最大月度增幅，人工智能引发担忧。

【原文：

US government debt posts its biggest monthly gain in a year amid AI angst.

】

item.title: 诺和诺德动荡一周抹去Wegovy带来的最后涨幅
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德公司因减肥需求带来的收益增长已正式成为历史。【原文：The weight loss-fueled gains of Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk A/S are officially a thing of the past.】

item.title: 欧盟推进与南共市贸易协定，迈出"临时性"一步
item.description: 欧盟将暂时适用其与南美国家南方共同市场集团的贸易协定，此举压过了部分议员的担忧——这些议员已将该协定提交至欧盟最高法院进行审查。【原文：The European Union will provisionally apply its trade deal with the Mercosur group of South American countries, overriding concern from some lawmakers who have sent the deal for a test at the bloc’s top court.】

item.title: 德意志银行的埃普斯坦档案将家族办公室推向公众视野
item.description: 在美政府针对杰弗里·爱泼斯坦案调查中披露的材料宝库里，有一批德意志银行的文件，揭开了全球金融界最隐秘角落之一的面纱。【原文：Among the trove of material released as part of the US government’s Jeffrey Epstein investigation is a stash of Deutsche Bank AG files that shed light on one of global finance’s most private corners.】

item.title: 快钱基金抛售美股转投避风港，市场恐慌情绪加剧
item.description: 近期席卷美国股市的剧烈波动已迫使部分量化投资经理完全撤出股票市场，转而投向风险较低的资产。【原文：The latest bout of volatility lashing US stocks has driven some quantitative investment managers completely out of equities and into less risky assets.】

item.title: 英伟达看似价值股，即便其盈利数据正高喊增长
item.description: 英伟达公司周三公布了超预期的财报，成为市场上最具增长潜力的企业之一。那么，为何其股价表现却像一只价值股？【原文：Nvidia Corp. has one of the strongest growth stories in the market after posting blowout earnings on Wednesday. So why is it trading at a level that looks like a value stock?】

item.title: 中国雅虎在津巴布韦启动硫酸锂工厂建设
item.description: 四川雅化工业集团有限公司表示，已开始在津巴布韦建设硫酸锂工厂。随着这个南部非洲国家推动矿业投资者升级加工业务，该项目应运而生。【原文：Sichuan Yahua Industrial Group Co. said it has started building a lithium sulfate plant in Zimbabwe as the southern African country pushes mining investors to upgrade their processing operations.】

item.title: 印尼暂停普拉博沃订购印度卡车的巨额订单
item.description: 印度尼西亚因政策制定者的反对，已暂停向印度塔塔汽车公司和马恒达集团订购10.5万辆卡车的订单。【原文：Indonesia is halting an order for 105,000 trucks from India’s Tata Motors Ltd. and Mahindra & Mahindra Ltd. following pushback from policymakers.】

item.title: 印度疫苗制造商巴拉特生物技术公司据称正考虑进行5亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度疫苗开发商巴拉特生物技术国际有限公司正考虑进行首次公开募股，预计融资额可能超过5亿美元。【原文：Indian vaccine developer Bharat Biotech International Ltd. is considering an initial public offering that may raise more than $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 道达尔能源在迪拜窗口期购入大量中东原油
item.description: 道达尔能源公司本月通过一个有助于确定中东地区迪拜原油基准价格的交易窗口，购入了创纪录数量的中东原油。【原文：TotalEnergies SE bought a bumper volume of Middle East crudes this month on a trading window that helps to set the price of the regional Dubai oil benchmark.】
